title: Bettermode
description:
Bettermode is an all-in-one community platform that transforms customer relationships into living, dynamic, and growing communities. 

Our platform helps businesses build engaged customer communities that drive growth, reduce support costs, and foster brand loyalty. 

With powerful customization tools and rich engagement features and tons of integrations, Bettermode helps convert passive customers into active brand advocates who connect, share experiences, and support each other.
